text: Monster Energy is the name of a brand of energy drinks manufactured by Hansen Natural and distributed by Anheuser-Busch (United States), PepsiCo Canada (Canada), Pepsi (Germany), Grupo Jumex (Mexico) and Schweppes (Australia). In 2020, Monster Energy had a market share of 39% in the energy drink industry. This is the second-largest after Red Bull. Monster Energy has sponsored many sporting events like the X Games and pays many sportspeople to wear their logo by And1. Monster Energy has 260 calories in a can. ==References== ==Other websites== *Official website *Official Canadian website. . Category:Energy drinks
title: Monster Energy
